about.title: About AI Chef Pro
about.description: AI Chef Pro is your ideal culinary assistant, offering innovative tools for chefs and cooks who seek to improve their efficiency and creativity supported by the potential that artificial intelligence offers today.
about.mission_desc: Facilitate the use of generative artificial intelligence to all professionals in cooking, restaurants and hospitality in general.
about.creativity_desc: Use cutting-edge tools to enhance and boost your management capacity, creativity and leadership in today's gastronomic world.
about.chef_desc: Developed by renowned chef Diego Schattenhofer and his professional team.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: We solve the most common questions about AI Chef Pro
faq.q1: What is AI Chef Pro and how can it benefit me as a chef or gastronomy professional?
faq.a1: AI Chef Pro is a Suite of AI Tools and Applications, models trained for daily use by Chefs, Cooks and hospitality professionals. It offers tools that boost your creativity, improve your management and expand your culinary knowledge. As a leader in any field of cooking or gastronomy, you'll be able to explore new flavor combinations, optimize your processes and stay up to date with the latest gastronomic trends. AI Chef Pro allows you to focus on your culinary passion while AI assists you in repetitive tasks, helps you solve scenarios and inspires you with new ideas.
faq.q2: What specific tools does AI Chef Pro offer for my professional management?
faq.a2: AI Chef Pro offers a variety of tools focused on your growth as a chef: Catering AI+ for event planning, Food Pairing AI for discovering innovative combinations, Mermas GenCal for optimizing ingredient use, ID Allergens for ensuring food safety, Mental Coach for your professional wellbeing, and others. It also includes thematic recipe generators, weekly the system releases a new app within the suite that responds to a solution.
faq.q3: What are the available subscription plans and their prices?
faq.a3: We offer plans adapted to different stages of your career as a chef: Member (Free) to explore basic functionalities, Pro (€10/month) ideal for individual chefs, Premium (€15/month) for frequent use and greater creativity, Premium Pro (€25/month) for chefs in leadership roles, and Premium Plus (€50/month) with unlimited use for executive chefs. Each plan is designed to support your professional growth and adapt to your changing needs as a chef.
faq.q4: What level of technological experience do I need to use AI Chef Pro?
faq.a4: AI Chef Pro is designed with chefs and professionals of all technological levels in mind. The interface is intuitive and easy to use, accessible from computers and mobile devices so you can use it in the kitchen or wherever you need it. The system learns from your preferences, offering increasingly relevant suggestions. You don't need to be a technology expert; if you can use a smartphone, you'll be able to make the most of AI Chef Pro.
faq.q5: How does AI Chef Pro protect my recipes and personal data?
faq.a5: We understand that your recipes are your most valuable intellectual property. At AI Chef Pro, we use advanced encryption technologies to protect all your information. Your recipes and personal data are kept strictly confidential and never shared. We offer regular backup options to ensure you never lose your work. Your creativity and privacy are safe with us.
faq.q6: Can I try AI Chef Pro before subscribing?
faq.a6: Absolutely! We offer a free Member plan that lets you explore AI Chef Pro's basic functionalities without commitment. It's an excellent way to discover how the platform can enhance your creativity and efficiency as a chef. When you're ready to access more features and take your kitchen to the next level, you can easily upgrade to one of our paid plans.
